gameDescription: Visit all locations to collect inspiring quotes!

collectible.title: The Journey Begins
collectible.content: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
collectible.author: Lao Tzu

collectible.title: Stay Curious
collectible.content: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
collectible.author: Albert Einstein

collectible.title: Embrace Change
collectible.content: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
collectible.author: Alan Watts
